barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Henry Austin, September 22, 1820. Warning him not to be deceived by an advertisement of lands in Texas.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Henry Austin, September 22, 1820. Warning him not to be deceived by an advertisement of lands in Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="09-22-1829">September 22,1829.*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*This letter was to have gone by the mail the *date_mentioned n="09-01-1829">1st of this month*/date_mentioned* but on the *date_mentioned n="08-29-1829">29th of last*/date_mentioned* I was taken with the fever and was insensible and at the point of death for some time. I am now proped up to write this—the object of which is to guard you against such wild schemes as the one which I have seen for the first time this day in the *location_mentioned*national Intelligencer*/location_mentioned*, of which *person_mentioned*Dennis A Smith*/person_mentioned* is the *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Exiter*/person_mentioned* [Exter] the principal— it is all a deception— *person_mentioned*Exiter */person_mentioned*is what the law calls an *person_mentioned*Empresario */person_mentioned*and an *person_mentioned*Empresario */person_mentioned*is nothing more than an *person_mentioned*agent */person_mentioned*hired by the *person_mentioned*Govt*/person_mentioned*, to bring in a certain number of *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned* of a particular discription—, if he introduces them he will be entitled to receive a premium at the rate of five leangues for each 100 *person_mentioned*families*/person_mentioned*— this is all he can get and he is not entitled to that until after the *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*have been received by the *person_mentioned*Govt*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*commissioner*/person_mentioned*- he has no right nor authority to survey nor to do any kind of act of any description whatever except barely to bring in the *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*and his agency may be annulled by the *person_mentioned*Govt*/person_mentioned*, for good cause, in the same manner than any other principal can revoke authority given to any *person_mentioned*agent*/person_mentioned*— This is all the authority that *person_mentioned*Exiter */person_mentioned*has to do what he is doing*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[To Henry Austin, Matamoras.]*/p*
*/div1*
